name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-flow-dashboard
title: Flow Dashboard
shortDescription: This web part demonstrates displaying the list of flows in different environments, ability to re-enable flows which are stopped or suspended, and the flow run history of the selected flow.
longDescription: This web part demonstrates displaying the list of flows in different environments, ability to re-enable flows which are stopped or suspended, and the flow run history of the selected flow.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
